title: 22nd October 1895: Granville–Paris Express train crashes through a wall at the Gare Montparnasse railway station
itunes:summary: The Granville–Paris Express train ran across the station platform, crashed through a 60cm wall, and fell 10 metres to the street below after it overran the buffer stop at the Gare Montparnasse ...
dc:creator: History Pod
description: The Granville–Paris Express train ran across the station platform, crashed through a 60cm wall, and fell 10 metres to the street below after it overran the buffer stop at the Gare Montparnasse ...
